message: Let's start with a fair division. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust it later if you want.
My turn. How about 60/40?  It's better for both of us than waiting and losing money to inflation.
I'm still willing to negotiate. Let's try 70/30.  We'll both get more this way than if we keep waiting.
This back and forth isn't helping.  Let's split it evenly at 50/50 and call it a day.
